periods.name: Today
periods.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 1pm, then rain likely and patchy fog. Cloudy. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 42 in the afternoon. East wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 7pm, then rain likely and patchy fog and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 44, with temperatures rising to around 60 overnight. South wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Thursday
